definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the absorption characteristics and mechanism of bergenin in rat intestine.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究岩白菜素在大鼠肠道中的吸收机理。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, some mechanisms of defoaming in refine sugar were related here.
sentences.chinese: 并对制糖业中的消泡机理进行了论述。

sentences.english: In this paper, we analyze the force-fighting mechanism of quad redundant servo system.
sentences.chinese: 对四余度伺服系统的力纷争现象进行了机理分析。

sentences.english: The hydration mechanism of matrix materials adulterated admixtures was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了掺入外加剂后基体材料的水化机理。

sentences.english: Reaction pathway of cyclohexanone over these catalysts was presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了环己酮在这类催化剂上双聚反应的机理。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the research advances of polyaniline anticorrosion coatings and different mechanisms of anticorrosion.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了聚苯胺防腐涂料的研究进展及不同的防腐机理。

sentences.english: The leach aiding effect and action mechanism of leach aid agent citric acid are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了助浸剂柠檬酸的助浸效果及其作用机理。

sentences.english: Courses include molecular biology, pathobiology, viral pathogenesis, and related topics.
sentences.chinese: 分子生物，病理学，病毒发病机理和相关主题。

sentences.english: The mechanism of shakedown was studied by using dislocation theory.
sentences.chinese: 并用位错理论对其安定机理做了初步分析。

sentences.english: The mechanism of corrosion inhibition has been explained from the point of view of electron transfer.
sentences.chinese: 从电子转移的角度说明了含氮有机化合物的缓蚀机理。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the curative effect and mechanism of hyperbaric oxygenation(HBO) therapy for perennial allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨高压氧治疗常年性变应性鼻炎的疗效及机理。

sentences.english: Objective To research on the possible mechanism of male macula retinae.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨男性黄褐斑发病的可能机理。

sentences.english: This paper also discussed the mechanism of excellent stability of fluorine-containing organic radicals at roo…
sentences.chinese: 并讨论了含氟有机自由基的良好室温稳定性的机理。

sentences.english: Objective Explore the biochemical mechanism of actions of Jiangguiyin capsules against myocardial ischemia and reperfusion injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究姜桂饮胶囊抗心肌缺血的生化机理。

sentences.english: The paper puts emphasis on the corners mechanism in puer tea market.
sentences.chinese: 文章重点对普洱茶市中的逼仓机理进行了分析。

sentences.english: The mechanism and accomplishment method of PET bottle treated with plasma are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍等离子体处理聚酯瓶的机理及处理的方法。

definition: to have an effect/to play a role/to be operative/to work/to function
a derivative (complex product derived from simpler source material)
